Access to RhodeCode via API KEYÂ¶

Starting from version 1.2 rss/atom feeds and journal feeds can be accessed via api_key. This unique key is automatically generated for each user in RhodeCode application. Using this key it is possible to access feeds without having to log in. When user changes his password a new API KEY is generated for him automatically. You can check your API KEY in account settings page.

Support my development effort.
